snippet: In a battle of Congressional defense hawks versus deficit hawks on Thursday, the Pentagon won out in a victory that presages a broader revolt against tight spending limits.
abstract: House Budget Committee votes to add $2 billion in additional 'emergency' war funding to budget that has raised combat funds by $38 billion; move sets up battle between Republican defense hawks and deficit hawks over budget limits and defense spending.
lead_paragraph: In a battle of Congressional defense hawks versus deficit hawks on Thursday, the Pentagon won out in a victory that presages a broader revolt against tight spending limits.

headline.main: Republican Budgets in Both House and the Senate Add to Military Spending
headline.print_headline: Republican Budgets in Both House and the Senate Add to Military Spending

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
